TextView.android:text: *St Michael's Church, Songyae* (Thai: วัดอัครเทวดามีคาแอล ซ่งแย้; RTGS: Wat Akkhara Thewada Mikha-aeo Songyae) is a Roman Catholic parish church in the northeastern Thai village of Nong Songyae, Kham Toei Sub-district, Thai Charoen District, Yasothon ProvinceNong (หนอง) indicates a fen; swampy or marshy land; Song (ซ่ง) is dialect for a group; yae (แย้) is the Beauty or Common Butterfly Lizard, Liolepis belliana.\n*Location* Yasothon Province, Thailand
